text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One afternoon, Grass Wonder and I<n>sit down to unwind after
the day's<n>training session.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today, Trainer. I found<n>some good tea, so I'd
like to make<n>you a cup.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Still, while I understand the need to<n>recover after my last
race, it seems a<n>shame to shorten our training<n>sessions to
this extent.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
For the past few days, we've been<n>finishing before the sun
even goes<n>down...
choice_data_list: We should prioritize resting for now.
We should prioritize resting for now.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I know that, of course. I'll need<n>a well-rested body to
win... Right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"The last drop makes the cup run<n>over," as they say. I am
always<n>grateful for your kind consideration. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding, dong...

text_block_list.name: School PA
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder, please report to the<n>student council
president's office.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, what could that be about?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'm back, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I was asked to participate in a<n>scrimmage for the upcoming
school<n>orientation.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It will be quite an honor to show my<n>racing to new students
who hope to<n>one day run in the Twinkle Series. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I should start training<n>immediately—oh? Is that a look of<n>
concern on your face?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right. I was swept up in the<n>excitement of being
selected for the<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I will limit myself to some<n>light running in
preparation.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Please don't trouble yourself to<n>accompany me. I'll be fine
controlling<n>my own pace.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She says she'll keep her running<n>under control, but this is
the same<n>racer who turned down offers until<n>she was
perfectly satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once she decides to win, even if it's<n>just a scrimmage,
she'll tackle the<n>challenge with everything she has... I<n>
should keep an eye on her.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Phew... Three more laps... But faster<n>this time!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sure enough, I see her training as if<n>there's a big race
coming up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I know how she feels about<n>winning, so I keep my
distance,<n>watching just to make sure she<n>doesn't go
overboard.

text_block_list.name: Caster Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Such incredible speed! Grass Wonder<n>makes a huge final
sprint!

text_block_list.name: Caster Umamusume
text_block_list.text: And across the line! Grass Wonder<n>takes first!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder's win is<n>overwhelming. As soon as the race
is<n>over, the young students begin to<n>gather around her.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Heeey! That was awesome!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
You look real nice, but inside you're a<n>beast! You're super
cool!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Heehee, what a privilege to be called<n>a beast. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. Do I have something on<n>my face?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I really hope you race in the Twinkle<n>Series! You gotta win,
beast lady!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry—I won't fail. And when<n>you're older, we can
all race together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From today's scrimmage, I can see<n>that Grass wants to
win more than<n>ever. And I'll be supporting her every<n>step
of the way.
